languages.text: "Не зазнавайся, пытаясь обыграть меня в подобные игры, {mf|новенький|новенькая}. Свою шкурку Вольного Торговца ты всего ничего носишь, я же за годы успел заматереть". {n}Каллигос ядовито фыркает.{/n} "Если таков был твой довод в пользу ксеносов, увы, ты просчитал{mf|ся|ась}, {name}. И более я не желаю поднимать эту тему".

traits.locale_text: "Не зазнавайся, пытаясь обыграть меня в подобные игры, {mf|новенький|новенькая}. Свою шкурку Вольного Торговца ты всего ничего носишь, я же за годы успел заматереть". {n}Каллигос ядовито фыркает.{/n} "Если таков был твой довод в пользу ксеносов, увы, ты просчитал{mf|ся|ась}, {name}. И более я не желаю поднимать эту тему".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Don't think that you can outsmart me at such games, new blood. You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time at all compared to an old hand like me." {n}Calligos scoffs acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. And I do not wish to discuss this any further."
languages.original_text: "Не зазнавайся, пытаясь обыграть меня в подобные игры, {mf|новенький|новенькая}. Свою шкурку Вольного Торговца ты всего ничего носишь, я же за годы успел заматереть". {n}Каллигос ядовито фыркает.{/n} "Если таков был твой довод в пользу ксеносов, увы, ты просчитал{mf|ся|ась}, {name}. И более я не желаю поднимать эту тему".

traits.locale_text: "Don't get any ideas trying to outsmart me in such games, new blood. You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time, compared to me, the old guard. {n}Calligos snorts acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. I don't wish to discuss this any further."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Don't get any ideas trying to outsmart me in such games, new blood. You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time, compared to me, the old guard. {n}Calligos snorts acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. I don't wish to discuss this any further."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Don't get any ideas trying to outsmart me in such games, new blood. You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time, compared to me, the old guard. {n}Calligos snorts acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. And I don't wish to discuss this any further."

You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time, compared to me, the old guard. {n}Calligos snorts acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. And I don't wish to discuss this any further."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Don't think that you can outsmart me at such games, new blood. You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time at all compared to an old hand like me." {n}Calligos scoffs acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. And I do not wish to discuss this any further."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Don't think that you can outsmart me at such games, new blood. You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time at all compared to an old hand like me." {n}Calligos scoffs acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. And I do not wish to discuss this any further."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «Que no se le pase por la cabeza tratar de aventajarme en tales juegos, {mf|novato|novata}. Es usted un Comerciante Independiente de nuevo cuño, a diferencia de mí, que llevo mucho dedicándome a esto». {n}Calligos resopla con sorna.{/n} «Si ese ha sido su argumento a favor de los xenos, mucho me temo que ha errado en su cálculo, {name}. Y no tengo ninguna gana de discutir más el asunto».
languages.original_text: "Don't think that you can outsmart me at such games, new blood. You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time at all compared to an old hand like me." {n}Calligos scoffs acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. And I do not wish to discuss this any further."

traits.locale_text: «Que no se le pase por la cabeza tratar de aventajarme en tales juegos, {mf|novato|novata}. Es usted un Comerciante Independiente de nuevo cuño, a diferencia de mí, que soy de la vieja guardia». {n}Calligos resopla con sorna.{/n} «Si ese ha sido su argumento a favor de los xenos, mucho me temo que ha errado en su cálculo, {name}. Y no tengo ninguna gana de discutir más el asunto».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “别以为你能在这样的游戏中战胜我，新来的。你才当了多久行商浪人？别以为能和我这种老资历相提并论。”{n}卡里戈斯刻薄地哼了一声。{/n}“如果这就是为那些异形求情的手段，那很遗憾，你打错了算盘，{name}。我不打算再讨论这个问题了。”
languages.original_text: "Don't think that you can outsmart me at such games, new blood. You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time at all compared to an old hand like me." {n}Calligos scoffs acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. And I do not wish to discuss this any further."

traits.locale_text: “别以为你能在这样的游戏中战胜我，新来的。你才当了多久行商浪人？别以为能和我这种老资历相提并论。”{n}卡里戈斯刻薄地哼了一声。{/n}“如果这就是为那些异形求情的手段，那很遗憾，你打错了算盘，{name}。我不打算再讨论这个问题了。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « N'espérez pas me battre à ce petit jeu, novice. Vous n'êtes libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} que depuis peu, comparé à moi qui fais partie de la vieille garde, {n}se moque Calligos sur un ton acide.{/n} Si c'est là votre seul argument pour sauver les xénos, je crains que vous ayez mal calculé votre coup, {name}. Cette discussion est terminée. »
languages.original_text: "Don't think that you can outsmart me at such games, new blood. You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time at all compared to an old hand like me." {n}Calligos scoffs acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. And I do not wish to discuss this any further."

traits.locale_text: « N'espérez pas me battre à ce petit jeu, novice. Vous n'êtes libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} que depuis peu, comparé à moi qui fais partie de la vieille garde, » {n}grogne Calligos sur un ton acide.{/n} Si c'est là votre seul argument pour sauver les xénos, je crains que vous ayez mal calculé votre coup, {name}. Cette discussion est terminée. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「新米よ、そんな遊び俺を出し抜こうなんて思うんじゃないぞ。お前は自由開拓者になってまだ日が浅い…俺に比べればな」{n}カリゴスは嘲笑する。{/n}「それが異種族に対するお前の主張なら、残念だが、買いかぶりだったな、{name}。これ以上議論する気はない」
languages.original_text: "Don't think that you can outsmart me at such games, new blood. You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time at all compared to an old hand like me." {n}Calligos scoffs acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. And I do not wish to discuss this any further."

traits.locale_text: 「新米よ、そんな遊び俺を出し抜こうなんて思うんじゃないぞ。お前は自由開拓者になってまだ日が浅い…俺に比べればな」{n}カリゴスは嘲笑する。{/n}「それが異種族に対するお前の主張なら、残念だが、買いかぶりだったな、{name}。これ以上議論する気はない」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Glaubt nicht, dass Ihr mich in solchen Spielen ausstechen könnt, neues Blut. Verglichen mit einem erfahrenen Veteranen wie mir seid Ihr erst seit sehr kurzer Zeit {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Calligos schnaubt verächtlich.{/n} "Wenn das Euer Argument für die Xenos war, habt Ihr Euch leider verkalkuliert, {name}. Und ich möchte nicht weiter darüber sprechen."
languages.original_text: "Don't think that you can outsmart me at such games, new blood. You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time at all compared to an old hand like me." {n}Calligos scoffs acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. And I do not wish to discuss this any further."

traits.locale_text: "Glaubt nicht, Ihr könntet mich in solchen Spielen überlisten, neues Blut. Ihr seid erst seit kurzem überhaupt {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, vor allem im Vergleich zu mir, der alten Garde. {n}Calligos schnaubt verächtlich.{/n} "Wenn das Euer Argument für die Xenos war, habt Ihr Euch leider verkalkuliert, {name}. Und ich möchte nicht weiter darüber sprechen."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Beni böyle oyunlarda zekânla alt edebileceğini sanma taze kan. Benim gibi bir ihtiyara kıyasla senin Hür Tacir olmanın üzerinden daha hiç zaman geçmemiş sayılır." {n}Calligos, iğneleyici bir şekilde alay ediyor.{/n} "Eğer ki zenolar için düşüncen buysa ne yazık ki yanlış hesap yapmışsın {name}. Bu hususu daha fazla tartışmak istemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Don't think that you can outsmart me at such games, new blood. You've been a Rogue Trader for barely any time at all compared to an old hand like me." {n}Calligos scoffs acidly.{/n} "If that was your argument for the xenos, alas, you have miscalculated, {name}. And I do not wish to discuss this any further."
